experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary: Led frontend and BFF work for Lowe's Returns Android and Web apps, improving scalability and developer velocity.
bullets: Led adoption of a micro-frontend architecture for the Lowe’s Returns Android app, improving scalability and developer velocity.
Implemented new UX flows in React, Ionic, and Capacitor for the Returns Android application used by sales-floor associates.

Built and maintained a Node.js + Fastify Backend-for-Frontend (BFF) service powering the Returns Android and Web apps, including optimized REST APIs, request validation, and cross-service orchestration.

experiences.title: Full-stack Web Developer
experiences.summary: Delivered end-to-end web applications for startups and SMBs, owning scoping, architecture, development, and deployment.
bullets: Delivered end-to-end web applications for startups and SMBs, covering scoping, architecture, and full-stack development.
Developed with Next.js, Node.js, and Go.
Deployed applications on AWS using custom CDKs and set up CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.
Sourced clients through Upwork and managed project delivery.

experiences.title: Front End Engineer
experiences.summary: Implemented React experiences on the AWS IAM Console and supported operational health through on-call responsibilities.
bullets: Led implementation and launch of new React user experiences on the AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) Console, impacting thousands of customers.
Participated in a monthly on-call rotation: resolved customer issues, triaged CloudWatch alarms, debugged service degradations, and collaborated with backend teams.
Presented weekly operational status updates to the broader Identity organization.
Voluntarily left AWS to relocate closer to family in Chicago; was not affected by layoffs.

experiences.title: Software Engineer Intern
experiences.summary: Contributed to a Dart + React–based web application and participated in Agile development and testing.
bullets: Contributed to development on a Dart + React–based web application (Wdesk).
Worked in Agile development processes, participated in code review, and wrote unit and integration tests.

experiences.title: Web Software Developer Intern
experiences.summary: Sole developer of a full-stack Audio Engineering discrepancy logger using the MEAN/Node stack, containerized for CI/CD.
bullets: Built an Audio Engineering discrepancy logger web application using MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js as the sole developer.
Containerized the application with Docker for CI/CD.

education.summary: Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering.

awards.title: Technical Education Senior Award
awards.summary: Awarded for outstanding work and dedication in Technical Education.
bullets: Awarded to students who exhibited outstanding work and dedication in the area of Technical Education.

awards.title: WSC Logo Design — 1st Place
awards.summary: First place prize in a logo design competition; $1,000 award.
bullets: Won 1st place prize of $1,000 for a logo design competition hosted by the Wheaton Sport Center in Wheaton, IL.
